description:
Manager Matsushiro challenges the manager of St. Pierre’s main store, Mokoyama, to a bread battle, which will be broadcast live. Can Kazuma win with his Ja-pan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Main Store!! The Dancing Meister!
La maison mère !! Meister mène la danse !
มาสเตอร์เต้นรำ จากสาขาใหญ่!
本店だ!! 踊るマイスター!
